title: What are some philosophies in your life you simply cannot live without? - Quora

response.answer_text: 1-Being the best version of yourself! 2-Focus on you for a change!! 3-life is better lived when u don't center it on what is happening around you and what is happening inside you instead.. Work on yourself and your inner peace!! 4-stop worrying about other people understanding you.... Get in touch with yourself instead... 5-You are your bigger commitment 6-one day god will bless you with one person that gives u everything, you have ever prayed and cried for in other people. And it will be beautiful. 7-BE KIND, BE FORGIVING, don't judge.. 8-The more you improve yourself and raise your vibration, the more you will see the things that are beneficial to your well being!!! 9-what you seek is also seeking you, that is the law of attraction..... BE PATIENT 10-What is truly yours will eventually be yours!!!

Whenever a relationship ended, I would repeat to myself: Let it go with the wind. It wasn't meant to be. (Especially if it causes you pain.)If it didn't matter to XX, it shouldn't matter to you.As a recovering hoarder, I walk into shops chanting in my head: I have enough. I already have so much. I have everything I need.It's beautiful but I can't possibly own all the beautiful things in the world.But the biggest question I keep asking myself constantly is: Is fear stopping you? Are you making this choice out of fear? If the answer is yes, I choose a different path. To sum it up: No fear. No regrets. Let it go.
